page.title: 04TEALING SCHOOL ROLL
page.content: THE SCHOOL ROLL DURING THE LAST 20 YEARS ROSE FROM 59 IN 1965 TO 93 IN 1970.A FOURTH TEACHER WAS APPOINTED IN 1971 AND HAD TO USE PART OF THE DINING HALL AS A CLASSROOM UNTIL NEW ACCOMODATION WAS BUILT.DURING THE 1970's AND EARLY 1980's THE ROLL DECLINED:IN 1976 THERE WERE 60 PUPILS AND THE FOURTH TEACHER WAS TRANSFERRED;BY 1983 THE ROLL HAD FALLEN TO 39 AND THE THIRD TEACHER WAS TRANSFERRED;THE ROLL IN 1985 IS 36 AND THE STAFF CONSISTS OF THE HEAD TEACHER AND AN ASSISTANT TEACHER , AUGMENTED BY PERIPATETIC TEACHERS SPECIALISING IN ART,MUSIC AND PHYSICAL EDUCATION.THE PUPILS ALSO HAVE SWIMMING INSTRUCTION AT DUNDEE LEISURE CENTRE AND P.E. AT WARD ROAD GYM., DUNDEE.
